Essay

Glenn Ligon, with Friends and Strangers
by Daniel Merritt

Glenn Ligon speaks with Chief Curator Daniel Merritt ahead of his forthcoming solo exhibition at the Aspen Art Museum.

In Conversation

Read More

Not Quite a Mirror
with Paul Chan

Paul Chan reflects on false selves, doing things badly, and the search for real intelligence.

In Conversation

Read More

Site Lines:
Matthew Barney on Staging the American Myth

Matthew Barney’s TACTICAL parallax, commissioned for AIR 2025, is staged in a repurposed military barn in Colorado. In conversation with Vic Brooks, he reflects on violence, spectatorship, and national identity across three iconic American arenas: the Western landscape, the football field, and the Broadway stage.
Link to https://airaspen.org/
